content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple description, simple problem. Perfect for fastest mode.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's simple but takes some time to figure

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Not just coding down a formula. 
I like it, even if it takes more than a few seconds.

Goal section
* Please format P and A as {{constants}} and then you may remove the brackets.

* Suggest to change "he" to "it".

Input section
* Please change "Ligne 1" to "Line 1".

* Please change "defined" to "for".

* Suggest to change "numbers and lenght of the following string" to "size of the grid".

* Please change "Ligne 2" to "Next [[N]] lines".

* Please change "wich" to "which".

* Please add "for one line of the grid" before "which".

* Please format P and A as {{constants}} and then you may remove the brackets.

Output section
* Please change "Ligne" to "Line" (twice).

* Please format "LEFT", "RIGHT", "x", "0", "UP" and "DOWN" as {{constants}}.

* Suggest to change "number needed" to "[[number of times]]" (formatted as a variable).

* Please add "(separated by a space)" before "or".

* Suggest to delete all the "+"s.

Constraints section
* As N is both the height and width of the grid, it isn't necessary to state the second constraint.

Cases
* Each pair of test and validator should be similar, but remain different. Please revise the cases.

Thanks.

Thanks for all advice.
It's actually much better !
